SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp

Class LocalDeliveryHandlerFactory

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.LocalDeliveryHandlerFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientConnectedFactory
public class LocalDeliveryHandlerFactory extends Object implements ClientConnectedFactory
Factory for creating LocalDeliveryHandler instances.

Configure this factory with a mailbox factory and local domain, then set it on the SMTP server to enable local mail delivery.

Configuration Example (XML)


 <smtp-server port="25">
   <local-delivery-handler>
     <local-domain>example.com</local-domain>
     <mailbox-factory class="org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.maildir.MaildirMailboxFactory">
       <base-path>/var/mail</base-path>
     </mailbox-factory>
   </local-delivery-handler>
 </smtp-server>
Author:
Chris Burdess

  • Constructor Details

    • LocalDeliveryHandlerFactory

      public LocalDeliveryHandlerFactory()
      Creates a new factory with default settings. The mailbox factory and local domain must be set before use.

    • LocalDeliveryHandlerFactory

      public LocalDeliveryHandlerFactory(MailboxFactory mailboxFactory, String localDomain)
      Creates a new factory with the specified settings.
      Parameters:
      mailboxFactory - the factory for creating mailbox stores
      localDomain - the domain this server accepts mail for

    • createHandler

      public ClientConnected createHandler()
      Description copied from interface: ClientConnectedFactory
      Creates a new handler for an incoming client connection.

      This is called once per connection. The returned handler receives the initial ClientConnected.connected(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ConnectionInfo, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.handler.ConnectedState) callback and manages the connection's lifecycle.

      Specified by:
      createHandler in interface ClientConnectedFactory
      Returns:
      a new handler instance
